item.title: Balancing Bot
item.author: Author
item.description: In this post, I am going to share my experience in developing a balancing bot. As I haven’t formally learned any courses about the control system, I could not guarantee the correctness of all the points. The Cascade PID Controller for the Bot PID There are too much explanation about the PID controller. So I will just share my own understanding. You must have tried to play a song with a steel ruler, watching it vibrate, become weaker and weaker and finally stop.

item.title: A First Step in STM32 Embedded Rust
item.author: Author
item.description: A brief summary for recent learning about embedded rust in internship and projects. Resources The Book: Basic rust grammar. Pay attention to Channel, Mutex, Cell, RefCell etc. in the concurrency section, which are also useful in embedded rust. Discovery: There is a new version using micro:bit when I write this blog. I was reading the STM32F3Discovery version. The Embedded Rust Book: If you are experienced in embedded systems, you can jump right in to this book.
